short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Browser Automation & Web Scraping. Quickly, no coding needed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate websites and scrape data, no coding needed. Powered by AI.

Imagine if your browser could handle your repetitive tasks for you. With ScraperSensei, it can.

ScraperSensei lets you create custom browser bots to automate almost any website action, form filling, data entry, data scraping, and more—all without writing a single line of code.

With ScraperSensei, you can:

	•	Scrape data from any website with just a few clicks, powered by OpenAI Vision
	•	Automate tasks like filling out forms, sending messages, or gathering info
	•	Schedule and run bots on a set schedule, or trigger them when you need
        •      Use your own OpenAI Key to manage the use of AI
	•	Connect with tools like Zapier for smooth, automated workflows

Use it for:

	•	Data scraping and entry
	•	Moving data between apps
        •      Building social media bots
	•	Automating website actions and workflows
        •      Download and share your automations with other users
        •      Share your automation with your team


ScraperSensei makes automation easy, saving you time and boosting your productivity, all from your browser.

If you run into any issues, please don’t hesitate to get in touch on an@scrapersensei.com!
